dimensions:
H x W x D (teapot): 9.7 x 9.6 x 18.1 cm (3 13/16 x 3 3/4 x 7 1/8 in.)
H x diam. (lid): 3 x 2.3 cm (1 3/16 x 7/8 in.)
title: Teapot
description: Globular body, scrolled strap handle; spout terminating in a dog's head; cover with flower in high relief, round the base of which is a metal ring.  Body yellow, with two shaped panels outlined in gold and black bands, of white reserve with bouquets of flowers; smaller panels on cover.
name: Teapot
